r.d: This package helps you to encode and decode punycode strings easily.
r.n: Bug #16463 - mbstring.func_overload support #8098 Cannot inherit from undefined class idna_convert #11644 Wrong line in IDNA/php4.php #10784 Net_IDNA::singleton() calls non-existant factory() method #10783 Net_IDNA::getInstance() reference notice #8387 Problem with encode Polish letters Converted to package.xml version 2.0 Restructed packet PHP 5.3 errors fixed (Bug #15892) QA Release
